name: Spicy Cornbread Stuffing
description: Stuffing is not just for the holidays! Makes a spicy side dish for any Tex-Mex meal.
preparation: Combine cornbread, one half of the corn package, and ham in a large bowl.
Blend second half of the corn package in a food processor with eggs, dip mix, Sea Salt, and Black Pepper.
Stir egg mixture into stuffing, tossing to combine.
Place in lightly sprayed 9” x 13” baking dish. Lightly spray a large sheet of foil with oil and use to cover the dish, oil-side down. Bake for 40 minutes.
Remove foil and continue baking for approximately 20 minutes or until top is golden and slightly crisp.
